Summary: Saw two gold lights change to single red light then simply shot away.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stanfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was working a security job as a supplement to being a correctional officer at brown creek correctional center.on this particular job,i could bring my wife as i sat and observed a strobe light atop a tower that would not stay on,and should it go out,i was to call my dispatch and from there they would notify the people who needed to be aware and so forth.i was in my jeep,i had the engine running,and the heat was on because it was cold for november in that region.(and my wife was with me)we arrived on site at around 11pm,we talked,ate,and eventually my wife fell asleep.i was leaned back in my seat, but was wide awake; and about 2 1\2 hours into the shift i was watching the horizon when out off the horizon in front of me,two gold lights---not yellow not amber---but gold lights alternated off and on then turned ito a deep red and shot straight up then left at an angle at an incredible speed,and it left this glowing path of glittery white light.i woke up my wife who didnt see it,anf tried to explain it to her.i ruled out fireworks because it was all too big to be fireworks,and too my knowledge we have nothing that can quite move like that.i was in the navy,a trained observer,seen some pretty cool things,but this was different.i knew there was a small airstrip nearby,but i dont think it was directly in front of my line of sight.there's no major air bases around.i remember thinking that this was just great--i dont know what it was,and i hated that i saw it,because what was it,who do you tell?---knowing there'll be no definitive answer.my wife thought i was seeing a plane but this wasnt a plane because of the way this thing moved.after a while sitting there trying to sort this out,i fell asleep.i was wide awake before and was quite astonished and a little shaken--but i fell asleep. now---all i saw were lights acting in a manner that is not within the normal scope of my knowledge as to how aircraft move,and i fell asleep in spite of my elevated mood for about a 1\2 hour.im not saying this was filled with gray folks from eta carinae and they abducted me--but this light displayed some odd characteristics.anyone ever reported a similar sighting? i also have 3 more incidents to report if youre interested.
